item.title: It will be the year of home automation
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I seldom talk about financial stuffs here, but I’d like to tell you that I have following stocks currently on my watch list: Comcast, AT&T, iRobot, TiVo, DirectTV, HomeDepot, Lowe’s. So you got it – they are all more or less related to home automation, which I believe should be the trend of year 2013 [...]
item.content:encoded:
I seldom talk about financial stuffs here, but I’d like to tell you that I have following stocks currently on my watch list: Comcast, AT&T, iRobot, TiVo, DirectTV, HomeDepot, Lowe’s.

So you got it – they are all more or less related to home automation, which I believe should be the trend of year 2013 (or even 2014).

Let’s see (by the end of this year) if I made the right judgement or not.
